title.rendered: Monson celebrates the Queen’s Jubilee in style

content.rendered:
It’s been a busy few months at Monson with lots of celebrate, activities galore and even our little friends from Portland Kindergarten made a visit!

Head over to our Facebook page to keep up to date with everything that’s happening at the home:  https://www.facebook.com/monsoncarehome/

The Monson Team

Monson Care Home Queens Jubilee Street Party

What a fabulous afternoon.  Thank you to the wonderful team, relatives and friends who joined in the fun and made it so special.

 

 

A visit from Portland Kindergarten

We were so delighted to welcome back our little friends from Portland Kindergarten today.  We got artistic, played games and sang songs we so look forward to there next visit.

       

      

Inclusion 21 popped in to say hello

We were delighted to welcome and get to meet Inclusion 21 yesterday – what a wonderful group of young people, full of enthusiasm and joy and what talent we all had such a great time.

itemListElement.name: Monson celebrates the Queen’s Jubilee in style

@graph.name: Adam Welsh
@graph.description: Adam joined Autograph Care shortly before the group purchased their first home, Inwood House, in 2019. Adam trained as a commercial lawyer, spending his early career working in London and overseas before relocating to the North West where he grew up. Whilst the role varies day-to-day, Adam is primarily responsible for supporting sales & marketing activity across the business and identifying other care homes to grow the Group.
